node.title: Cristiano Ronaldo announces death of his baby boy
node.description: "Our baby boy, you are our angel. We will always love you," Ronaldo and his partner said in a joint statement.
node.content: ["Soccer superstar Cristiano Ronaldo and his partner Georgina Rodr\u00edguez said Monday that their baby boy has died. The couple said in October that\u00a0they were expecting twins.\u00a0", "\"It is with our deepest sadness we have to announce that our baby boy has passed away,\" Ronaldo and Rodr\u00edguez said in a joint statement. \"It is the greatest pain that any parents can feel.\"\u00a0", "It is not clear how the child died. The Manchester United striker and Rodr\u00edguez, a model, said their baby daughter survived.\u00a0", "\"Only the birth of our baby girl gives us the strength to live this moment with some hope and happiness,\" the couple said. \u00a0", "A post shared by Cristiano Ronaldo (@cristiano)", "The couple thanked medical staff for their care and support, adding that they're \"devastated\" and need privacy at this \"very difficult time.\"", "\"Our baby boy, you are our angel. We will always love you,\" they said.\u00a0", "Scores of fans, teammates and others sent their heartfelt wishes to Ronaldo and his family.\u00a0", "\"Your pain is our pain. Sending love and strength to you and the family at this time,\" Manchester United wrote on the couple's Instagram post.\u00a0", "Christopher Brito is a social media producer and trending writer for CBS News, focusing on sports and stories that involve issues of race and culture."]
